TextEn: Good morning. Please have a seat here. What´s the problem?
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: I have a terrible stomachache.
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: Do you have diarrhea?
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: Yes, I do.
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: Do you have any other symptoms?
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: Yes, I feel sick.
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: You mean you feel nauseous?
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: That´s right. I feel like vomiting. And right now I feel dizzy, too.
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: When did the symptoms start?
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: This morning. Yesterday evening I ate something raw.
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: All right. Please take off your clothes to the waist and lie down there. ... Just tell me if it hurts when I do this.
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: It doesn´t hurt. ... Ouch. It hurts there.
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: Okay. Let´s hope it´s just indigestion, but we´ll need to run some diagnostic tests to be sure. We´ll run a blood test and we´ll also need a urine sample.
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: Can you give me something for the time being?
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: Yes, I´ll give you a prescription for indigestion tablets.
Subtopic: At a doctor / I have a terrible stomachache.

TextEn: Hello. Can I help you, ma´am?
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: Yes. Could you tell me how to send some money to someone with an account with a bank in Germany?
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: Well, you can pay by mail, telegraphic or SWIFT transfer. Or you can have a banker´s draft and mail it yourself to the beneficiary.
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: Which is the best way?
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: It depends on the amount and how fast you want that person to receive the money. A SWIFT transfer is the fastest method but a banker´s draft is usually the cheapest. How much do you wanna send?
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?
International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: Why don´t you send it by mail payment order?
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: How long does it take?
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: About a week.
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: I don´t know. Can I send it more quickly?
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: Sure. You can have a Telegraphic or a SWIFT transfer.
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: And how long do those take?
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: Both a Telegraphic Transfer and a SWIFT transfer will normally be credited to the payee´s account within three or four working days, depending on whether the beneficiary´s bank is among our correspondent banks or we have to route the transfer through a third bank.
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: I see. How can I pay by Telegraphic Transfer?
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?

TextEn: You have to fill out this form, ma´am.
Subtopic: International transfers / How long does it take?
